room_title: Escape room "Swiss Original" by Adventure Rooms in New York
review: We had so much fun here! We did the Swiss room with four of us in total. The room wasnâ€™t THAT difficult, but still difficult enough to get your mind thinking. The staff member was extremely nice and very professional. Will definitely come back again.

room_title: Escape room "Swiss Original" by Adventure Rooms in New York
review: I've been here 3 times. Great place especially if you're a beginner. The puzzles aren't too crazy. You definitely have to think outside of the box though. It would be a lot of fun for all ages. I love how the bookings are private. That's not something most escape rooms allow. I'll definitely return when they change their themes.

room_title: Escape room "Swiss Original" by Adventure Rooms in New York
review: It was a great time!! It definitely kept us on our toes and very entertained. It is a great team building event as well as a good afternoon with friends or even a birthday party! It is a must go!

room_title: Escape room "Swiss Original" by Adventure Rooms in New York
review: We had a blast! I would definitely recommend it. The whole experience was really fun and exciting.
